title: Handle Lost and Found Inquiry
description: A fan reports they lost their wallet at yesterday's game and wants to know if it has been turned in.

tasks.description: Ask the fan for a description of the wallet and where they think they lost it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the details of the lost item.

tasks.description: Search the venue's lost and found database for a matching item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a wallet matching the description that was turned in from the fan's seating section.

tasks.description: Inform the fan that their wallet has been found and explain the process for retrieving it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the fan with instructions on how to pick up their wallet.
